497: Job Description: The Opportunity We’re looking for one person, to fill the role of Coordinator, Data Research and Analysis, conducting industry research to support our Go-To-Market plan. You’ll collaborate with our sales team, pre-sales, marketing, product, and executive leadership to break down competitor data and create a robust SWOT analysis. You’ll engage directly with existing and prospective clients to better understand industry trends and realities, hot topics, challenges, and more. About Us C&R Software is the global leader in collections and recovery software, with just under 40 years of experience and more than 450 clients in over 60 countries around the world. We’re conquering complexity, helping our clients help their customers in financial distress get back on track, and using tools and technology to humanize the process. We’re an autonomous subsidiary of Jonas Software, headquartered in Canada, with offices throughout North America, the United Kingdom, Europe, Australia, New Zealand and Africa. Jonas is a subsidiary of Constellation Software, Inc., also headquartered in Canada, with $3.97B in annual revenue in 2020.
